content: this tea cosy crochet pattern creates a striking cover for your tea pot which will jazz up any afternoon tea the pattern is designed with beginners in mind with a detailed photo tutorial the running rings around granny tea cosy also has a corresponding coaster and jam jar cosy which is available as a pattern bundle in my shop there really is nothing more comforting than a good cup of tea - it really can solve all your problems i believe that it should be served properly from a warmed pot and what better to keep your pot warm than this snazzy kitsch tea cosy details - uk & us terminology in separate pattern files - video stitch tutorials - skill level - beginner - size - one size - fits a 4-6 cup tea pot adjusting button close placement will help it fit larger tea pots - permission to sell the finished product please link to cosy rosie uk as the designer where possible materials - size 4mm crochet hook - double knit acrylic yarn in 4 shades - i used woman s institute premium acrylic yarn 100g/250m in shade s plum fushia baby pink and white - darning needle - 4 stitch markers - tea pot - bakewell tarts x 6 optional this pattern has been fully tested and edited to ensure it s easy to read follow and complete your project if you need any support to complete your crochet project please get in touch don t forget to tag me in a photo your finished item so i can share in your excitement at completing your tea cosy @cosyrosieuk
